# `01`背包

## 原理

见《进阶指南》第`274`页。

![](/algorithm-blog/img/0037.bmp)

“最多”。

## 模板题

[AcWing-2-01背包问题](https://www.acwing.com/problem/content/2/)

```cpp
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

const int N = 1010;
struct node {
    int v, w;
};
int n, m;
node a[N];
int f[N];

int main () {
    cin >> n >> m;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i) cin >> a[i].v >> a[i].w;

    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i)
        for (int j = m; j >= a[i].v; -- j)
            f[j] = max(f[j], f[j - a[i].v] + a[i].w);
    cout << f[m] << endl;
    return 0;
}
```
